SEARCH
Package com.whatacook.cookers.model.favorites

Class FavoriteDto

java.lang.Object
com.whatacook.cookers.model.favorites.FavoriteDto
public class FavoriteDto extends Object
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for Favorite entity. Represents the favorite recipes and ingredients for a user.

Annotations: - @NoArgsConstructor: Generates a no-arguments constructor. - @AllArgsConstructor: Generates an all-arguments constructor. - @Getter: Generates getter methods for all fields. - @Setter: Generates setter methods for all fields. - @ToString: Generates a toString method for the class. - @EqualsAndHashCode: Generates equals and hashCode methods for the class. - @Document: Marks this class as a MongoDB document.

Fields: - id: The unique identifier for the favorite entity. - recipes: A list of recipe IDs that are marked as favorites. - ingredients: A list of ingredient IDs that are marked as favorites.

Methods: - addRecipe(String recipeId): Adds a recipe to the list of favorite recipes. - removeRecipe(String recipeId): Removes a recipe from the list of favorite recipes. - containsRecipe(String recipeId): Checks if a recipe is in the list of favorite recipes. - notContainsRecipe(String recipeId): Checks if a recipe is not in the list of favorite recipes. - addIngredient(String ingredientId): Adds an ingredient to the list of favorite ingredients. - removeIngredient(String ingredientId): Removes an ingredient from the list of favorite ingredients. - containsFavoriteIngredient(String ingredientId): Checks if an ingredient is in the list of favorite ingredients. - notContainsFavoriteIngredient(String ingredientId): Checks if an ingredient is not in the list of favorite ingredients.
